attributes.background:
Dear Boris!

I think i speak for the whole of the country when I say, we are currently going through hard times, but the best of Britain has been found!  Mr Captain Tom Moore deserves a knighthood for raising funds for the NHS.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
